values.value: Define and enforce data retention schedules that ensure personal data is not kept longer than necessary for its processing purpose. GDPR storage limitation principle requires organizations to establish clear retention periods and automated deletion workflows.

Document retention periods for each category of personal data stored in Salesforce based on legal basis and processing purpose. Implement automated scheduled jobs or flows to identify and purge records that have exceeded their retention period. Create an archival process for records that must be retained but no longer need active access. Maintain a data retention register and review it annually.
